A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This Movie laughs in the face of all the Fanboys!  And that makes it great\, Its Star Wars people\, its supposed to be fun and surprise you.  GO see it!  you will love it if you don't take it too serious.  If your worried about who Smokes father is\, then\, maybe you need to get a life!  It was perfect.  Well done!
